item.title: Instrumentals v/s Vocal Music
item.description: I often talk to friends about music and musical preferences. This post is inspired by one such theme which often finds its way in most of these conversations: instrumental music v/s vocal music. Or more precisely, why listen to instrumental, or plain music, when you can have vocals accompanying the music. This post is not from a musical perspective, but rather to emphasize on the entirely separate form of beauty inherent in instrumental music.
